label: Blend, Charles K., Toshiaki Kuramochi & Norman O. Dronen.  2015. Allopodocotyle enkaimushi n. sp. (Digenea: Opecoelidae: Plagioporinae) from the Short-Tail Grenadier, Nezumia proxima (Gadiformes: Macrouridae), from Sagami Bay, Japan, with a key to species of this genus and a checklist of parasites reported from this host. . Comparative Parasitology 82(2): 219-230.
